District 2, Place 1
===================

![](https://cityofseminoletx.org/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/Landon-Sims-1-1024x767.jpg)

**Landon Sims, District 2, Place 1**

I have been married to Danielle (Sage) Sims for 15 years. I have two children, Harper, 12 and Britten, 8. I have made Seminole my home since 2008 and love raising my family in here.
